scripts.postinstall: cd preview-redoc && npm install && cd ../preview-swaggerui && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build-webapps && npm run build-swaggerui && npm run build-redoc
scripts.build-webapps: npm run build-result && npm run build-openapi && npm run build-common && npm run build-scanconf && npm run build-scanconf-changes && npm run build-web
scripts.build-openapi: cd openapi && npm run build && cd .. && cd openapi-cjs && npm run build
scripts.build-result: cd result && npm run build && cd .. && cd result-cjs && npm run build
scripts.build-scanconf: cd scanconf && npm run build && cd .. && cd scanconf-cjs && npm run build
scripts.build-scanconf-changes: cd scanconf-changes && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build-web: cd web && npm run build && mkdirp ../../webview/generated/web && ncp dist ../../webview/generated/web
scripts.build-swaggerui: cd preview-swaggerui && npm run build && mkdirp ../../webview/generated/preview/swaggerui && ncp dist ../../webview/generated/preview/swaggerui
scripts.build-redoc: cd preview-redoc && npm run build && mkdirp ../../webview/generated/preview/redoc && ncp dist ../../webview/generated/preview/redoc
